promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple squid water-type pokemon with a white and black crystal core. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or squid. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Squidraqua, a a chibi young simple squid water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Burning Icicles. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "squid", "water" or "Squidraqua". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, squid-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: This playful, aquatic kiddo thrives in flowing habitats, capable of launching scorching icicles to stun prey and create cool sculptures.
